Articles.Content:
Just a thread as there is none.

I currently have a Rubik's 3x3 that I got 2 weeks ago (solvable), and a Dayan Magic Cube 2x2 that I got yesterday (Top layer needs memorization).

My fastest timed time was ~2 minutes for a 3x3.
I just throw it against a wall and put it back together correctly still takes 5 minutes:P
I had one with a blue face and feet that granted wishes.
I have a Dayan GuHong Rubiks cube. I can solve it pretty fast, never actually timed myself though. Think about 2 - 3 minutes at max.

A forum for everything...

I've tried Rubix Cubes before. It's just as hard as they say.
I tried solving a Rubik's Cube before. I ended up disassembling the whole cube and placing them back by color.
It's really not that hard to solve a cube, you just need to learn the algorithms which is memorization. Then you can learn the short cuts to speed up your solving.

It's really not that hard to solve a cube, you just need to learn the algorithms which is memorization. Then you can learn the short cuts to speed up your solving.

I need to memorize a lot of things in my studies already, and have a lot of things to do everyday. I think I won't be able to have a time for that...

*cue meme*
